name: Castile Soap 100% Pure Olive Oil Bar for Sensitive Skin
description:
Castile soap has been made throughout history since the 11th century. It's one of the oldest recipes for soap making and is known for it's gentle cleansing. I highly recommend this soap for people with sensitive skin, babies, and children. This soap is not scented, however, it does have a lovely faint olive oil aroma.

Weight: 3.5

Ingredients: Olive Oil, Distilled Water, Lye

Made only with plant based oils that are the highest quality to make your skin feel soft and clean. Every bar is cured for 4 weeks and its PH is tested for quality assurance.

**To assure your soap lasts as long as possible, make sure to let it dry after each use by placing it on a soap dish that is not in range of getting sprayed by the shower.**

name: Chocolate Hazelnut Bar made to smell like Nutella
description:
This bar smells good enough to eat! It is a mixture of chocolate and hazelnut fragrance. I even added real cocoa powder, which contains antioxidants to nourish your skin.

Weight: 4.5 oz 

Ingredients: Sweet Almond Oil, Castor Oil, Cocoa Butter, Coconut Oil, Olive Oil, Lye, Distilled Water, Cocoa Powder, Fragrance

Made only with the highest quality plant based oils to make your skin feel soft and clean. Every bar is cured for 4 weeks and its PH is tested for quality assurance. 

** To assure your soap lasts as long as possible, make sure to let it dry after each use by placing it on a soap dish that is not in range of getting sprayed by the shower.**

name: Black Raspberry Vanilla Bar with Cocoa Butter
description:
This listing is for one bar of handmade soap. It's main ingredient, cocoa butter, is extremely moisturizing and creates a thick foamy lather. I only use high quality all natural oils and ingredients. It is larger than your average bar of soap.

Weight: 5.5 ounce

Ingredients: Olive Oil, Sweet Almond Oil, Cocoa Butter, Castor Oil, Jojoba Oil, Lye, Disitilled Water, Fragrance, Black Oxide Powder, Lavender Oxide Powder

Made only with the highest quality plant based oils to make your skin feel soft and clean. Every bar is cured for 4 weeks and its PH is tested for quality assurance. 

** To assure your soap lasts as long as possible, make sure to let it dry after each use by placing it on a soap dish that is not in range of getting sprayed by the shower.**
